name: fortnite-api-stack
description: Fortnite API Stack - Modern microservices architecture for replay analysis

scripts.build: cd apps/web && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:web: cd apps/web && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/web && npm install && cd ../../packages/papi && npm install && cd ../worker && npm install && cd ../cron-monitor && npm install
scripts.vercel-build: cd apps/web && npm install && npm run build
